_comment: DEPLOYMENT INSTRUCTIONS: 1) Deploy code.js to Google Apps Script as backend API, 2) Deploy this dashboard to GitHub Pages/Netlify, 3) Update the 'inventory' URL below with your Google Apps Script deployment URL

app.name: Deep Roots Operations Dashboard
app.description: Unified dashboard for all Deep Roots Landscape operational tools

inventory._comment: REQUIRED: This is your primary backend. Deploy code.js to Google Apps Script and paste the Web App URL here. All API calls route through this endpoint.
inventory.name: Clippings - Inventory Management
inventory.description: Search inventory, manage stock, track equipment

grading._comment: Repair vs Replace Tool - Google Apps Script web app
grading.name: Repair vs Replace
grading.description: Equipment repair cost analysis and replacement decisions

scheduler._comment: Crew Scheduler - Local web app with drag and drop for crew assignments
scheduler.name: Daily Scheduler
scheduler.description: Crew scheduling with drag-and-drop for crew members, trucks, equipment, jobs, and salesmen

tools._comment: Hand Tool Checkout - Local web app with stacking and drag-and-drop functionality
tools.name: Hand Tool Checkout
tools.description: Hand tool checkout with stacked tool view, drag-and-drop to crews, and physical tag tracking

chessmap._comment: DRL Chess Map - Real-time crew location tracking and logistics planning
chessmap.name: DRL Chess Map & Logistics
chessmap.description: Real-time crew location tracking, logistics planning, and vendor proximity

ai.fallbackMessage: I can help you with inventory, grading decisions, scheduling, tool rentals, logistics planning, or crew location tracking. What would you like to do?
ai.routingPrompt: Analyze this query and determine which tool would be most helpful: inventory management, plant grading, scheduling, tool checkout, logistics planning, or crew location map. Return only: 'inventory', 'grading', 'scheduler', 'tools', 'logistics', 'chessmap', or 'general'.

deployment._comment: Deployment strategy: Backend (code.js) goes to Google Apps Script. Frontend (this dashboard) goes to GitHub Pages or Netlify.

backend.instructions: Deploy code.js to Google Apps Script as a Web App, then update services.inventory.url with the deployment URL

frontend.instructions: Deploy these files to static hosting. Update config.json with backend URL before deployment.
